Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Unham vica phala khajura ate anara honage
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karonge
Unham vica khubasurata ate cage caritara vali'am auratam honagi'am
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karonge
Huram (savaraga di'am sudari'am) khemi'am vica rahina vali'am
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karauge
Unham tom pahilam na kise manukha ne hatha laga'i'a hovega ate na kise jina ne
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karauge
Hare galici'am ate kimati bisatari'am te sar'hane la ke baithe honage
Phira tusim apane raba di'am kihari'am kihari'am ni'amatam tom inakara karonge
Vadi barakata vala, prasasa vala ate uci sana vala hai tere raba da nam
Jadom hona vali ghatana ho javegi
Usa de vaparana vica ko'i jhutha nahim
Uha ninva ate uca karana vali hovegi
Jadom dharati hila diti javegi
Ate pahara tuta ke cura cura ho janage
Phira uha khilari ho'i dhura sana ke rahi janage
Ate tusim loka tina tar'ham de ho javenge
Phira saje hatha vale, ki khuba hana
Ate khabe hatha vale (aphasosa), khabe hatha vale kiho jihe bure hana
Ate age vale tam age vale hi hana
Uha nere rahina vale loka hana
Ni'amatam de bagam vica
Unham di vadi sakhi'am pahile lokam vica hovegi
Ate thorhe pichali'am vicom honage
(Hire moti'am nala) jara'u takhatam te
Sir'hana la ke ahamane sahamane baithe honage
